learning_goals: Learners can compare three scientific models explaining tidal generation principles
Learners can identify and categorize peer teachers' misconceptions through open-ended questionnaire responses
Learners distinguish between everyday heuristics and scientific models in regional tide prediction with 80% accuracy
Learners can identify five common misconceptions that may arise during tidal phenomenon education.
